name: Mashed Parsnips
keywords: butter, parsnip, fall, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Butter, salt and white pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the parsnips but do not cut them up. Simmer them in water to cover until completely tender. Drain.
Scrape the outer pulp of the parsnips into a bowl. Discard the tough cores.
Mash the pulp, adding butter, plus salt and pepper to taste. Reheat before serving.
